name: JerusaBread
description:
This game is a project made in three months, by a small student team of six people.

Under the sacred oath of the Orders of the Angel Food Cake, your mission is to exterminate the cursed and devilish sweets, and to purify the Holy Land of Jerusa from any superfluous sucrose, so that the Equilibrium of all of the Food Kingdom can be brought back, once again.

Controls (we advise to switch your Keyboard to AZERTY to play the game comfortably)Keyboard / MouseDirections (up, down, left, right) Z / S / Q / DJumpSpaceShootLeft clickSwitch WeaponsA

 Team:

Lead Programer : Victoria LE MOINE

3D Artists : Marina GAWLIK, Emilie MARIETTE

2D Artists : Aliénor DUMOUSSAUD, Clara DENEUBOURG

Rig / Animator : Maxime SEIMANDI

Soundtrack :

Final Warm Up (The Microwave Song) · Shady Cicada
